mapper.select: select * from BIZ_MEDICAL_ORGAN where IS_DELETED = 0 and MD_NAME like '%' || #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
select md_name as orgName from BIZ_ADMINISTRATIVE_DIVISION where IS_DELETED = 0 and md_code =#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.fami_id, t.fami_code, t.household_name, (select A.DICT_NAME from P_DICTIONARY A, P_DICTIONARY_TYPE B where A.DICTTYPE_ID = B.TYPE_ID and A.IS_DELETED = 0 and B.STANDARD_CODE = 'JXV00.00.005' and A.DICT_CODE = t.live_type) as live_type, t.family_addr, (select t.name from p_resource_user_info t where t.code=t.doctor_code and t.medical_organ_code=#{familyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as doctor_code from p_resource_family_info t where 1 = 1
and t.household_name like '%' || #{householdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and t.family_addr like '%' || #{familyAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and t.family_org_code = #{familyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from p_resource_family_info t where 1 = 1
and t.landlord_name like '%' || #{landlordName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and t.family_addr like '%' || #{familyAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and t.family_org_code = #{familyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.order_number, (select A.DICT_NAME from P_DICTIONARY A, P_DICTIONARY_TYPE B where A.DICTTYPE_ID = B.TYPE_ID and A.IS_DELETED = 0 and B.STANDARD_CODE = 'GB/T4761' and A.DICT_CODE = t.household_code) as household_code, t.name, (select A.DICT_NAME from P_DICTIONARY A, P_DICTIONARY_TYPE B where A.DICTTYPE_ID = B.TYPE_ID and A.IS_DELETED = 0 and B.STANDARD_CODE = 'GB/T2261.1' and A.DICT_CODE = t.sex) as sex, t.birth_date, (select A.DICT_NAME from P_DICTIONARY A, P_DICTIONARY_TYPE B where A.DICTTYPE_ID = B.TYPE_ID and A.IS_DELETED = 0 and B.STANDARD_CODE = 'GB/T4658' and A.DICT_CODE = t.education_degree) as education_degree, (select A.DICT_NAME from P_DICTIONARY A, P_DICTIONARY_TYPE B where A.DICTTYPE_ID = B.TYPE_ID and A.IS_DELETED = 0 and B.STANDARD_CODE = 'GB/T6565' and A.DICT_CODE = t.career_code) as career_code, (select A.DICT_NAME from P_DICTIONARY A, P_DICTIONARY_TYPE B where A.DICTTYPE_ID = B.TYPE_ID and A.IS_DELETED = 0 and B.STANDARD_CODE = 'GB/T2261.2' and A.DICT_CODE = t.marriage_code) as marriage_code, t.remark, (select A.DICT_NAME from P_DICTIONARY A, P_DICTIONARY_TYPE B where A.DICTTYPE_ID = B.TYPE_ID and A.IS_DELETED = 0 and B.STANDARD_CODE = 'JXV00.00.020' and A.DICT_CODE = t.state) as state from p_resource_family_members t where t.FAMI_ID = #{familyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.state!='4' order by t.order_number
select t.name as orgName from p_resource_user_info t where t.code=#{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.medical_organ_code=#{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
